body:
Comment 12: 
Whomever wants to use 3DES-CBC is probably doing so because they have no choice. If we
refuse to add it, they'll have to switch to other client software. It doesnt do much for
anybody's security.

I am reworking transport.go in gosshnew to add support for AES-GCM (and we have base
library support, chacha20-poly1305), so I will reworking the design shortly anyway. 
That should make it relatively easy to add 3des-cbc.
